mapper.select: SELECT tb2.review_no, tb2.isbn13, tb2.content, tb2.rating, tb2.writer, tb2.reg_date, tb2.delete_yn, tb2.ID, tb2.NICKNAME, tb2.profile_image from (SELECT rownum rn, tb1.* FROM ( SELECT * from BOOK_REVIEW b join member m ON b.writer = m.id WHERE b.isbn13 = #{isbn} AND b.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC ) tb1 WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) tb2 WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(*) from BOOK_REVIEW WHERE isbn13 = #{isbn} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT count(*) from BOOK_REVIEW b join member m ON b.writer = m.id WHERE b.isbn13 = #{isbn} AND m.id = #{id} AND b.DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_REVIEW values( seq_book_review_review_no.nextval, #{isbn}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{id}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, tb1.* from (SELECT * FROM book_info bi JOIN BOOK_REVIEW br ON bi.isbn13 = br.ISBN13 WHERE br.writer = #{id} AND br.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY br.reg_date desc) tb1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) tb2 WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM BOOK_REVIEW WHERE writer = #{id} AND delete_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: update BOOK_REVIEW set delete_yn = 'Y' where review_no = #{reviewNo}
